mapper.select: select d.*, e.product_name from (select c.sort, b.product_no productNo, b.address_no addressNo, c.build_no buildNo, b.floor_no floorNo, b.room_no roomNo, b.product_count productCount, b.user_phone userPhone, b.user_name userName, b.get_flag getFlag, b.pay_flag payFlag, b.remark from (select a.product_no, a.address_no, a.floor_no, a.room_no, a.product_count, a.user_phone, a.user_name, a.get_flag, a.pay_flag, a.remark from t_order a where a.product_no = #{productNo} ) b left join (select ta.sort, ta.address_no, ta.build_no, ta.floor_no from t_address ta ) c on b.address_no = c.address_no and b.floor_no = c.floor_no) d left join t_product e on e.product_no = d.productNo order by d.sort, d.buildNo

select e.group_no groupNo, e.group_date groupDate, e.group_name groupName, e.product_no productNo, concat(e.product_name, '(', e.product_specs, ')') productName, e.product_specs productSpecs, e.order_no orderNo, e.address_no addressNo, e.floor_no floorNo, e.room_no roomNo, e.product_count productCount, e.user_phone userPhone, e.user_name userName, e.get_flag getFlag, e.pay_flag payFlag, e.remark remark, f.build_no buildNo, f.sort, f.lock_flag lockFlag from (select c.*, d.order_no, d.address_no, d.floor_no, d.room_no, d.product_count, d.user_phone, d.user_name, d.get_flag, d.pay_flag, d.remark from (select a.*, b.product_name, b.product_no, b.product_specs from ( select t.group_no, t.group_date, t.group_name from t_group t where t.group_no = #{group.groupNo}) a left join t_product b on a.group_no = b.group_no) c left join t_order d on d.group_no = c.group_no and d.product_no = c.product_no) e left join (select t.sort, t.address_no, t.build_no, t.floor_no, t.lock_flag from t_address t where t.village_no = #{group.villageNo}) f on e.address_no = f.address_no and e.floor_no = f.floor_no where f.address_no is not null order by f.sort, f.build_no, e.room_no
